metadata.title: CVE-2019-17133 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel through 5.3.2, cfg80211_mgd_wext_giwessid innet/wireless/wext-sme.c does not reject a long SSID IE, leading to a BufferOverflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17133` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-72-generic - 4.15.0-72.81
linux-image-4.15.0-72-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-72.81
linux-image-4.15.0-72-lowlatency - 4.15.0-72.81
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-72-generic - 4.15.0-72.81
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-72-lowlatency - 4.15.0-72.81
No subscription required

linux-image-5.3.0-26-generic - 5.3.0-26.28~18.04.1
linux-image-5.3.0-26-generic-lpae - 5.3.0-26.28~18.04.1
